amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that passengers using or transporting nonmotorized transportation are to be considered in the Amtrak Office of Inspector General's report on boarding procedures.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Lipinski.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
